title: The Enemy of the Good: Towards a Theory of Moral Progress
descriptions: This grant proposal seeks to develop an alternative theory of moral progress titled "The Enemy of the Good: Towards a Theory of Moral Progress". The proposed theory will center around the concept of expanding the circle of moral concern beyond parochial empathy and altruism tied to friends and kin. By addressing ethical features such as class, age, gender, ethnicity, religion, and species membership, the goal is to extend moral concern to include all individuals, regardless of arbitrary characteristics. Ultimately, this project aims to contribute to a more comprehensive understanding of moral progress and pave the way for a more inclusive and equitable society.
